metadata.title: CVE-2017-14722 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Before version 4.8.2, WordPress allowed a Directory Traversal attack in theCustomizer component via a crafted theme filename.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14722` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentynineteen - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwenty - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
wordpress-theme-twentytwentyone - 4.8.2+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.8.2+dfsg-1').
